Text:
Remote Hard Drive Image and Recovery

Backup and Recover hundreds of remote disk images.
Backup and Recover hundreds of remote partition images.
Centralized management, fast cloning speed, secure data transfer.
Parallelized backup and recovery tasks in a single run.
Designed for Corporate Environment
Fully Automatic Procedure.
Unattended mode, easy to use, timesaving network clone.
Support running on Windows PE 3.0 Boot CD/DVD or USB stick
System requrements:
Windows XP, 2003 Server, Vista, 2008, 7, 8, Server 2008, PE, Windows-X64
Administrative rights to execute PC Image Clone
1+ GB disk space, 50MB+ RAM
